text: Yes, you read that correctly, three million — million — years ago CO2 levels on Earth were the same as they are today, but there is one major difference between three million years ago and today…
CO2 levels were the same then as they are now…
We have also been told the problem is DEFINITELY NOT a billions-year-old planet running through cycles where the temperature might fluctuate a bit.

According to the study, scientists also discovered that during this period of Global Warming “there were no ice sheets covering either Greenland or West Antarctica, and much of the East Antarctic ice sheet was gone.”

start: How is this possible 2,999,971 years before Arnold Schwarzenegger bought his Hummer?

text: How is that possible 2,999,945 years before Americans moved to the suburbs and lit up the charcoal grills?

start: Naturally, even in the face of a study that totally debunks the whole concept of man-made Global Warming, ThinkProgress is sticking with that hoax but is also forced to concede the following:

text: But-but-but-but Alexandria Ocasio-Crazy told me we only have 12 years!
No, actually, what this study proves is that there is nothing we can do to stop  the Earth’s naturally occurring climate cycles.
